title: How to Cook Crudite in Disney Dreamlight Valley

steps.title: Crudite requires a single vegetable.
steps.content: Crudite requires a single vegetable. To make a Crudite in Dreamlight Valley, you can drop almost any vegetable in a pot. Try gathering Carrots, Mushrooms, Zucchini, or Cucumber. Some vegetables, such as Corn, will not yield a Crudite when cooked. When cooked, Corn turns into a Grilled Vegetable Plate. To cook anything in Dreamlight Valley, you will need a piece of Coal as well.

steps.title: Find vegetables at Eternity Isle, or buy seeds from Goofy's Stall.
steps.content: Find vegetables at Eternity Isle, or buy seeds from Goofy's Stall. Most vegetables can be harvested across the various biomes within Eternity Isle, but to acquire a specific vegetable, the easiest method is to purchase the appropriate seeds from Goofy's Stall.

steps.title: Purchase Coal from Kristoff's Stall, or mine for it yourself.
steps.content: Purchase Coal from Kristoff's Stall, or mine for it yourself. You can mine for Coal Ore from any rock spot in Dreamlight Valley, but the most reliable way to find Coal is to buy as much as possible from Kristoff's Stall. If you opt to mine for Coal, consider bringing a companion who specializes in Coal.

steps.title: Visit a stovetop.
steps.content: Visit a stovetop. You can cook your Crudite on any stovetop, even if it does not belong to you. For example, you can visit the kitchen in Mickey's home or Remy's restaurant.

steps.title: Drop a single vegetable into the pot.
steps.content: Drop a single vegetable into the pot. Do not combine multiple vegetables, as this will create a Grilled Vegetable Platter instead of Crudite. To complete the Missing Minnie quest, you will need to create five Crudites. They do not each need to be unique, but they must be made separately from one another.
